oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Research to highlight value of organic pork
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Aarhus , University
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farming Systems
Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Researchers from Aarhus University focus on meat and ethical quality in a research project which is to highlight the potentials and possibilities of free-range pig farming.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Aarhus , University (2012) Research to highlight value of organic pork. PigProgress. Online at <http://www.pigprogress.net/Pork-Processing/Consumer-Issues/2012/11/Research-to-highlight-value-of-organic-pork-1111578W/ <http://www.pigprogress.net/Pork-Processing/Consumer-Issues/2012/11/Research-to-highlight-value-of-organic-pork-1111578W/ >>, accessed on: 2012.
